Talk43:
<sp:3:0:2:0901>So you used the rain to sneak up on us,
did you?
Talk44:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry_01>I mean, yeah, I had to squint through the
rain, but my gaze never once left the bog!<sp:5:0:0>
Talk15:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>You gotta tell me these things. Keeping
watch means you have to do more than
just...watch.
Talk45:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>The rain only makes things worse too.
How are we gonna get through this?
Talk16:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Tired_01>Ah, well. Can't get 'em all. No use crying
about it.

You know, you're pretty good. Almost
as good as us at hunting treasure.
Talk46: <sp:3:0:2:0a01><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><snd:Ease_01>It's hard to keep an eye out in this rain.<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff><sp:5:0:0>
Talk17:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_01>Huh? You're a treasure hunter too? Are
you also going after <clr:0000>Misko's treasu<clr:ffff>—
Talk47:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Can't get soaked by rain or struck by
lightning if we're in a cave, right?
Talk48:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>The problem is, so did everyone else.
Every would-be treasure hunter in the
kingdom is out to expand their wardrobe.
Talk20: <sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:Painful_01>So much for the "just ignore him" gambit.<sp:5:0:0>
Talk21:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>There's no way you're also a treasure
hunter if you don't know about <clr:0000>Misko's
treasure<clr:ffff>, so we can tell you a little.
Talk22:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><clr:0000>Misko <clr:ffff>was one of the greatest bandits
Hyrule ever saw. And not just a bandit...

They were also a fashionista. Rumor has it
Misko's renowned <clr:0000>clothing collection<clr:ffff> is
hidden somewhere in Hyrule.
Talk23:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive_01>We think the clothes are hidden in the
<clr:0000>caves<clr:ffff> that appeared during the Upheaval!

Like up ahead in the Eldin region.
You couldn't really explore back
when Death Mountain was erupting.
But now everything's cooled down, and
the place is all rocky and rugged.

<sp:3:0:2:0801>There are probably tons of secret <clr:0000>caves<clr:ffff>
perfect for hiding treasure!
Talk26:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_01>I've almost got it... Almooost...


Maybe we can get the treasure chest if
we... <sp:5:1:0>Huh?
Talk28: <sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>The treasure? Oh, that guy took it.
Talk01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_01>I've almost figured it out. Just a bit more
brainstorming, and... Hmm...
Talk02:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>You've got this, Dak! That treasure is as
good as ours!
Talk31:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive_01>Hey, Dak! Let's head to those caves to
get <clr:0000>Misko's treasure<clr:ffff>!
Talk04:
<sp:3:0:2:0201>Hey! You! We're having a private
conversation here!
Talk33:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Before, you couldn't get close to Eldin
with the lava and all.

<sp:3:0:2:0801>But now that it's cooled off, I'll bet there
are lots of <clr:0000>caves<clr:ffff> no one knows about!
Talk05:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry_00>Huh? What are you— How long have you
been there?!
Talk34:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Work_00>Prissen! What did I tell you about
keeping quiet?
Talk06:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry_01>We found that chest first! It's ours!


I mean, it's in a <clr:0000>bottomless bog<clr:ffff> of certain
doom<sp:5:0:0> with no place to <clr:0000>put your feet<clr:ffff>, so
you probably can't get to it anyway.
<sp:3:0:2:0501>But any <clr:0000>hidden treasure<clr:ffff> that's maybe,
certainly, definitely in there is OURS!
Talk35:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_01>Put the foothold there...<sp:5:1:0> No, higher...


If it weren't for this <clr:0000>bottomless bog<clr:ffff>,
getting the treasure would be a piece
of cake.
Talk37:
<sp:3:0:2:0901>That guy took it! I was watching him the
whole time!
Talk38:
<sp:3:0:2:0201>Oh, it's you. You know it's rude to
eavesdrop, right?
Talk09:
<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:Sad_01>Yeesh. I need to think about how to get
that treasure, so do your job and keep
watch. Got it?
Talk10:
<sp:3:0:2:0200>As you can see, we're working here.
So buzz off.
Talk39:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Tired_01>Ah, well. Can't get 'em all. <sp:5:0:0>No use crying
about it.
<sp:0:4:0>You're pretty good, y'know. You might
just make it as a treasure hunter!
Talk12:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Sad_01>D-Dak... I'm not sure how to tell you
this, but...

The treasure is gone.
Talk41:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Surely you've heard the rumors that
Misko hid pieces of their famous
<clr:0000>clothing collection <clr:ffff>across Hyrule.
Talk13:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL_01>Wha?! Prissen, you were supposed to
be keeping watch!
Talk42:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Wait, don't tell me you're after Misko's
treasure too...
